tasks.task: Loading hay from the field into the bales.
subtasks: Riding the ATV to the field.
Attaching the baler to the ATV.
Operating the baler to collect cut hay.
Transporting bales from the field to the storage area.
Unloading bales from the ATV to the storage area.

tasks.task: Starting the tractor and attaching the plow.
subtasks: Entering the tractor and starting the engine.
Selecting the plow attachment.
Guiding the plow through the field to turn under crop residue.

tasks.task: Securing hay onto the trailer.
subtasks: Walking behind the baler to collect bales.
Moving a ramp or chute to load bales onto the trailer.
Lifting and placing hay bales onto the trailer using their hands and possibly a lever or ramp.

tasks.task: Inspecting a field from a drone.
subtasks: Setting up and operating a drone.
Flying the drone over the field to survey crop health.
Analyzing the data collected from the drone to assess crop needs.

tasks.task: Manual weed removal in a row-crop field.
subtasks: Walking through the rows of crops.
Identifying and grasping weeds near the plants.
Pulling weeds up by the roots by hand.
Discarding the weeds or disposing of them properly.

tasks.task: Driving a combines harvest wheat.
subtasks: Operating the combine to cut and thresh wheat.
Guiding the combine through the field rows.
Ensuring proper setting of the combine for efficient harvest.

tasks.task: Planting corn via an autonomous technique.
subtasks: Preparing the field by plowing or cultivating.
Loading corn seeds into the planter.
Guiding the autonomous planter as it follows a preprogrammed path.
Ensuring the planter is correctly set for optimal planting depth and spacing.

tasks.task: Attaching a spray boom to a tractor and applying pesticide.
subtasks: Selecting the correct pesticide and mixing it in the sprayer.
Attaching the spray boom to the tractor.
Adjusting the spray pressure and coverage pattern.
Operating the sprayer while driving through the fields.

tasks.task: Operating a chaff shredder on a forage truck.
subtasks: Attaching the chaff shredder to the forage truck.
Shredding loosely packed cereal crops to aid in storage or feed.

tasks.task: Driving a livestock vehicle to transport animals.
subtasks: Loading animals into the livestock trailer.
Securing the animals in the trailer for transport.
Driving the trailer to the destination and unloading the animals.

tasks.task: Operating a grain auger to load grain into a storage bin.
subtasks: Connecting the grain auger to the combine or truck.
Guiding the grain flow into the auger.
Starting the auger and monitoring its operation.

tasks.task: Applying fertilizer to a field using a spreader.
subtasks: Loading the fertilizer into the spreader.
Setting the rate and pattern of application.
Pulling the spreader behind a tractor and distributing fertilizer evenly.

tasks.task: Fixing an antique tractor.
subtasks: Inspecting the damaged areas of the tractor.
Gathering necessary tools and parts for repairs.
Reassembling the tractor components after fixing them.
